## Return Value

An initialized `PDFActionResetForm` instance, or `NULL` if the object could not be initialized.

## Discussion

Initially, there are no fields and [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFActionResetForm/fieldsIncludedAreCleared] returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a reset form action.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

An initialized `PDFActionResetForm` instance, or `NULL` if the object could not be initialized.

## Discussion

Initially, there are no fields and [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFActionResetForm/fieldsIncludedAreCleared] returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: init()
